replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
安装这个 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-654195-1-1.html

或者这个 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-901461-1-1.html 效果应该是最好的吧

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
[安全][PoS] AntiAttackRL —— 让熊孩子们的压测失效吧！[Bukkit+BC+Sponge][1.7+]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-877521-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

开个白名单不就行了，你再能压测也打不进来

replies.author: 丑喜人丶
replies.txt_content: 最好的解决办法就是外置登录！
